forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.
